ViewObject.Name: GraphtotalOppurtunitiesCount
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT COUNT(OPPORTUNITIES.OPPORTUNITY_ID) as Failed FROM OPPORTUNITIES,USERS WHERE OPPORTUNITIES.CREATED_BY_ID=USERS.USER_ID AND OPPORTUNITIES.IS_SUCCESS='y' AND (USERS.SUPERVISOR_ID=4 OR USERS.USER_ID=4) AND OPPORTUNITIES.END_DATE < TO_TIMESTAMP('31-MAR-18 05.53.57.120000000 AM') AND OPPORTUNITIES.START_DATE > TO_TIMESTAMP('01-APR-17 05.53.57.120000000 AM')
